title: Wanda Sykes | Quarantine Love
description:
Hear some selections from "Quarantine Love," the hottest R&B album focusing on socially isolated romance.

Then, Seth interviews comedian Wanda Sykes. Finally, he checks in with Amber Ruffin about how to be a better ally.
